alert.note: Alert for Boone; Logan; McDowell; Mingo; Wyoming (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 12:18AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Buchanan, northwestern McDowell, southeastern Mingo, southeastern Logan, western Wyoming and south central Boone Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1218 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Argo, or 13 miles northeast of Grundy, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pineville, Oceana, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Mallory, Amherstdale-Robinette, Twin Falls State Park, Gilbert Creek, Gilbert, Iaeger, Clear Fork, Panther, Cyclone, Coal Mountain, Kopperston, Amherstdale-Robine, Hurley, Avondale, Wolf Pen and Baileysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
